akn:subsection.akn:heading: Notification of referral to Department of Justice

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Notification of referral to Department of Justice If a referral is made to the Department of Justice from any element of the intelligence community regarding a significant unauthorized disclosure or compromise of classified national intelligence under this section, the Director of National Intelligence shall notify the congressional intelligence committees of the referral on the date such referral is made.
